title: Congrats Buttermints, Congratulations Graduation, Mint Candies, After Dinner Mints, Butter Mint Candy, Fat-Free, Individually Wrapped (55 Pieces)
features: CONGRATS BUTTERMINTS: These Delicious Smooth & Creamy Butter Mints are the perfect addition for any Candy Tray Buffet, Celebration, Party or when Serving Coffee. Our mouthwatering long-lasting flavors make these Mint Candies a special treat for students, customers at the doctor's office or bank, and even for adults!

PARTY FAVOR: These After Dinner Mints are ideal to use as Party Bag fillers, Stocking Stuffers, Themed Celebration, Birthday Parties, Piñata Fillers, Care Packages, Wedding Party Favors, and any Other Event that needs some Sweetness to it! Tastes as good as they look and are guaranteed to satisfy your sugar cravings!

PACKAGING: Perfect party size packaging - Choose Between our Individually Wrapped 55, 110 or 275 Butter Mints per bag. Gluten Free, Fat-Free, Kosher Certified and No Trans Fat. Proudly Made in the USA! The Great Taste of Butter Mints Candy Will Bring You Back to Your Childhood!
BUY RISK-FREE: At the Fruidles Company, we fully stand behind our products with total satisfaction and 100% money-back guarantee.
